Translations.Text: Ekzempl these 2 grup est blind surd kompar al seer hearer! Ili est egal? Vi ne pren heed
Ni send Noah his popol dir mi ven vi klar warner
Vi ne worship DI. Mi tim por vi retribution painful tag
Estr disbelieved his popol dir Ni seg vi est ne plur than human est us ni seg ke 1 popol sekv vi est des mav among us! Ni seg vi ne posed any avantagx us. Ja ni pens vi est liars
Li dir O my popol ki mi hav solid proof el my Lord ki se Li ben me His mercy vi ne seg gxi? Ni ir force vi est kred therein
(O my popol mi ne pet vi any mon; my wage ven nur el DI. Mi ne dismissing those kred; ili meet their Lord Li sol jugx them)! Mi seg vi est ignorant popol
O my popol support me DI mi dismiss them? Vi ne pren heed

(Mi ne pretend mi posed trezor DI nor do mi kon future nor do mi pretend est angxel. Nor do mi dir al those despised your okul ke DI testament ne bestow any blessings them! DI kon PUT KI est their innermost thoughts! Mi did this) mi est transgressor
Ili dir O Noah vi argued us kept arguing Ni challenge vi bring doom vi minac us vi est truthful
Li dir DI est Unu brings gxi vi se Li vol tiam vi ne escape
Eben se mi advised vi my advice ne benefit vi gxi est di testament send vi astray! Li est your Lord Him vi returned
Ili dir Li far up this fabel tiam dir mi far tiam mi est responsible my krim mi est innocent de any krim vi commit
Noah ne inspir de your popol kred beyond those jam kred! Ne saddened their actions
Cxarpent ark our watchful okul our inspiration ne implore Me sur behalf da those transgressed ili destin dron
While li cxarpent ark whenever kelk da his popol pas him ili rid him. Li dir Vi rid us ni rid vi just as vi rid
Vi do gxi surely trov out who sufer shameful retribution incur everlasting punishment
When our judgment ven atmosphere bol over ni dir Port gxi par de each kind together kun your famili those kondamn! Port vi those kred nur a few kred him
